channel.title: Yeah im new
channel.description:
i'm new to the coding of servers, so yes, i am a noob. i am asking stupid questions. it's probably obvious, but:
every time i change an account to admin(go into my source folder, to characters, and change the rights to 2) when i log in to see it happen, it doesn't make him admin, and when i go back into the file, it has the rights back to 0. i have testscape source, and only way i can make an admin account is if i log in as Smitty. how can i change an account into admin?
and slomifier said he had a guide on port forwarding through a linksys router, can someone post a link? i used search, and i really don't feel like searching page through page through page to find it.

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ooo cause u kinda confused me lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

That was what I was going to say, or my second thought was that the person was logged in when he/she tried to change their status.

Read full topic

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

[quote=“armorstr, post:1, topic:79324”]i’m new to the coding of servers, so yes, i am a noob. i am asking stupid questions. it’s probably obvious, but:

every time i change an account to admin(go into my source folder, to characters, and change the rights to 2) when i log in to see it happen, it doesn’t make him admin, and when i go back into the file, it has the rights back to 0. i have testscape source, and only way i can make an admin account is if i log in as Smitty. how can i change an account into admin?

and slomifier said he had a guide on port forwarding through a linksys router, can someone post a link? i used search, and i really don’t feel like searching page through page through page to find it.[/quote]

exit out and it should have a save option… Your problem was you probably didn’t save.

Read full topic

Really, you cant chage it through the files? Whats the point in the “playerRights = *” tag even being there?

really because it works for me…

…

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

us sniper, u dont noe wat ur talkin bout, when using a TestScape source, u have to go into client.java to make people mods/admins/creators. u cant jus go into there character files

Read full topic

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @us_sniper04 us sniper04
item.description:
@us_sniper04 wrote:

ok what you were doing wrong was you had your account logged onto your server when you were trying to make him an admin. in order to make him an admin you have to be logged off with that character.

so first you log off you guy.

then you go into char and your guys profile.

change the player rights to whatever you want it to be.

then you save

and log on

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @armorstr armorstr
item.description:
@armorstr wrote:

it was the Testscape Source i used. i changed over to Narbscape and i was able to change it, it saved it.

Read full topic

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @armorstr armorstr
item.description:
@armorstr wrote:

[quote=“slomifier, post:2, topic:79324”]lol, I’ll post 1, but I g2g, so I’ll have to find it quick.

PS it got locked for something random, but i’ll still post a link.

As for your problem at hand, i’d suggest finding the word smitty in your client.java, coppying the script that looks something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*")) { playerRights = **; }

change * to the name you want to change the status of, and change the ** to the play right that you wanna change.

For example:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

Sorry, i g2g, so i cant post a link, shouldent be to hard to find. Go into my profile, and go to the bottom of the page and click see last posts of this person. The post is called something like “An alternate way to port forward.”[/quote]

thank you!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Yeah im new
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

lol, I’ll post 1, but I g2g, so I’ll have to find it quick.

PS it got locked for something random, but i’ll still post a link.

As for your problem at hand, i’d suggest finding the word smitty in your client.java, coppying the script that looks something like this:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*")) { playerRights = **; }

change * to the name you want to change the status of, and change the ** to the play right that you wanna change.

For example:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { playerRights = 3; }

Sorry, i g2g, so i cant post a link, shouldent be to hard to find. Go into my profile, and go to the bottom of the page and click see last posts of this person. The post is called something like “An alternate way to port forward.”

Read full topic
